name: ModifiedImage
description: Easily created modified copies of existing images.
long-description:
Easily created modified copies of existing images,
caches all results by generating a hash from the instructions.
Uses the GD image library to perform rendering.

virtual-modifiers.URI: Outputs a URI for the modified image
virtual-modifiers.URL: Outputs a URL for the modified image
virtual-modifiers.Transparent:
This modifier can be used with URI or URL,
howver it must be placed before the URI or URL modifier.

scaled.description: Scales the image specified by the file argument.
